metadata.title: Support | Dofollo
metadata.description: Contact support or find answers to your questions.

hero.title: Contact Support
hero.description: Have a question or need assistance? Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact_info.title: Get in Touch
contact_info.description: Whether you have a question about features, pricing, or need technical support, our team is ready to answer all your questions.

email_support.title: Email Support
email_support.description: Our friendly team is here to help.

partner_cta.title: Partner with us
partner_cta.description: Interested in a partnership or enterprise solution? We'd love to hear from you.

contact_form.title: Send us a message
contact_form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly.
contact_form.success_message_prefix: Thank you for contacting us. We represent received your message and will respond to

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: How can we help you today?
